title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 433.5 - Public benefit provision
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 433.5 - Public benefit provision

State Regulations

In order to assure the preservation and maintenance of
projects funded under this Part and to assure that a public benefit accrues
from the expenditure of public funds, the office will require the project
sponsor to convey a preservation or maintenance restriction, easement or other
protective agreement to the office or such other entity as the office deems
appropriate. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
433.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
